name: Using the Playground
description: Learn how the playground works before you start coding.

steps.title: Welcome to the Playground
steps.task: This is where you write and run code. Let's take a quick look at what's here.

steps.title: Intro Panel
steps.task: This button opens or closes the getting-started panel. It gives you a quick overview of what the playground offers.

steps.title: Getting Started
steps.task: The intro panel gives you an overview of the editor's features and links to tutorials.
steps.learn: Use the intro panel for orientation

steps.title: Load an Example
steps.task: Click here to browse and load example code snippets. A great way to see v0 composables in action.

steps.title: Project Files
steps.task: Your files live here. Click any file to open it in the editor.

steps.title: Code Playground
steps.task: Write your code on the left. The preview on the right updates instantly as you type.
steps.learn: Write code and see it run live

steps.title: Ready to Code
steps.task: That's all there is to it. Load an example from the toolbar or start from scratch.
